entry.summary:
Author: noctstate

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 555Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 28

Summary: Body still light from the comedown, eyes closed to the world, the cellphone resting on his sternum finally rings with the chime that belongs solely to Tim. Damian gives it a moment longer than he should, basking in the sweet feeling of knowing that he's won. He's pulled Tim from whatever obligation, dragged his attention forcibly back onto himself.With his off hand, Damian grabs the phone, answers it, and doesn't even have a moment to say hello before Tim is cursing at him.

entry.title: Into the Fire
entry.summary:
Author: noctstate

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 395Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 13

Summary: “What are you, suicidal?!” Damian grabs the front of Tim's torn uniform, pressing him into the building's brick facade.Air is forced with a huff from lungs that have been inhaling nothing but smoke for far too long, soot covered skin layered with sweat trails—Damian wants to shake him. Wants to grab his head in both hands and slam it into the wall. Just the once. Maybe twice for good measure. Then, perhaps it could get through his skull.

entry.title: The Robins: Red Hood & The Queen
entry.summary:
Author: SpiderFan_33

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,810Chapters: 17/17Kudos: 13

Summary: Damian Wayne believes he can rule the League of Assassins without losing himself. Jason Todd knows better. He’s bled for the League. Died for it. Come back wrong. And watching Damian claim the title of Demon’s Head feels less like a victory than the first step toward a familiar damnation. Determined to save Damian from the rot Jason recognizes all too well, Jason makes a choice that will brand him a traitor: he aligns himself with Talia al Ghul. Assassin. Queen. Survivor. A woman who never pretended violence could be purified—and who sees in Jason a weapon sharpened by truth rather than denial. What begins as strategy turns intimate fast. Their partnership is forged in shared scars, shared fury, and a mutual hunger for control in a world that raised them as tools. Talia offers Jason something dangerous: desire without apology, power without lies, and a bed where neither of them has to pretend they’re anything but broken and lethal. To tear Damian away from a crown that will consume him, Jason may have to seize the League himself—and decide whether saving a brother is worth surrendering to the darkness he’s always claimed as his own.

entry.title: The Robins: Damian Wayne & The Demon's Head
entry.summary:
Author: SpiderFan_33

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,266Chapters: 13/13Kudos: 14

Summary: Two years after Bruce Wayne’s death, Damian Wayne finally has freedom—and finds himself caught between three futures. With Gotham stabilized and the Bat-Family reshaped, Damian’s partnership with Jon Kent burns bright with desire, hope, and a dangerous mismatch in how they see the world. But when Ra’s al Ghul declares the mourning period over and summons his grandson back to the League of Assassins, Damian is forced to confront a legacy that insists Gotham was never meant to be his destiny. As Ra’s tempts Damian with power and Talia al Ghul quietly maneuvers to bind him to Tim Drake—the one person Damian trusts without question—love becomes leverage, intimacy becomes strategy, and loyalty is tested from every side. Caught between Jon’s belief in a brighter future, Tim’s unspoken devotion, and a destiny written in blood, Damian must decide not just who he loves—but who he is willing to become.
